00162 enum NetworkStatus
00163 {
00164     NET_GOOD = 0,
00165     NET_UNKNOWN_HOST,  // host finger print not in cache
00166     NET_CONN_REFUSED,  // host exists, but wouldn't allow a connection
00167     NET_AUTH_FAILED,   // user+pass did not work on host
00168     NET_READ_ERROR,
00169     NET_WRITE_ERROR,
